semantic_identifier: [GOLD-37]: Add counterfactual “what would improve fit” suggestions to Fit Score explainability
title: Add counterfactual “what would improve fit” suggestions to Fit Score explainability

sections.text: Extend the explainability service to generate counterfactual guidance for a segment/account: the minimal changes to key signals (e.g., firmographics, usage, integrations, support volume) that would materially increase Fit Score. Define a deterministic, bounded output schema (top N suggestions with expected delta and required field/value changes) and ensure results are stable and safe (no PII leakage, no suggesting impossible changes). Add unit tests covering low-signal cases, conflicting signals, and capped output size.
